languages.text: Кровавая расправа над капитаном Хротко повысила расторопность блюстителей и тех, над кем они поставлены надзирать. Работники двигательных и щитовых отсеков стараются изо всех сил, чтобы не схлопотать взыскание.

The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.
languages.original_text: Кровавая расправа над капитаном Хротко повысила расторопность блюстителей и тех, над кем они поставлены надзирать. Работники двигательных и щитовых отсеков стараются изо всех сил, чтобы не схлопотать взыскание.

traits.locale_text: The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The workers of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.
The massacre of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of the enforcers and those over whom they are trusted to supervise.

The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.

languages.text: Die grausame Hinrichtung von Captain Hrotko hat den Eifer der Enforcer und ihrer Untergebenen vergrößert. Die Crews der Maschinen- und Schildmodule arbeiten aus Angst vor Bestrafung härter denn je.
languages.original_text: The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.

traits.locale_text: Die grausame Hinrichtung von Captain Hrotko hat den Eifer der Enforcer und ihrer Untergebenen vergrößert. Die Crews der Maschinen- und Schildmodule arbeiten aus Angst vor Bestrafung härter denn je.

languages.text: L'exécution macabre du capitaine Hrotko a poussé les prévôts et ceux qu'ils supervisent à faire preuve de plus de diligence. Les équipes chargées de l'entretien des moteurs et des modules de boucliers travaillent désormais d'arrache-pied de crainte de subir le même sort.
languages.original_text: The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.

traits.locale_text: L'exécution macabre du capitaine Hrotko a poussé les prévôts et ceux qu'ils supervisent à faire preuve de plus de diligence. Les équipes chargées de l'entretien des moteurs et des modules de boucliers travaillent désormais d'arrache-pied de crainte de subir le même sort.

languages.text: La brutal ejecución del capitán Hrotko ha aumentado la diligencia del personal de seguridad y de aquellos a quienes debían supervisar. La tripulación de los módulos de motores y escudos ahora trabajan más que nunca por miedo al castigo.
languages.original_text: The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.

traits.locale_text: La brutal ejecución del capitán Hrotko ha aumentado la diligencia del personal de seguridad y de aquellos a quienes debían supervisar. La tripulación de los módulos de motores y escudos ahora trabajan más que nunca por miedo al castigo.

languages.text: フロトコ中隊長の陰惨な処刑により、エンフォーサーと監督を任された者たち両者の任務に対する士気を高めた。エンジンやシールドモジュールのクルーは、罰を恐れ、一生懸命働くようになった。
languages.original_text: The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.

traits.locale_text: フロトコ中隊長の陰惨な処刑により、エンフォーサーと監督を任された者たち両者の任務に対する士気を高めた。エンジンやシールドモジュールのクルーは、罰を恐れ、一生懸命働くようになった。

languages.text: 赫洛卡上尉被残忍处决，这让执法者与受执法者监管的船员变得更加勤勉。由于害怕受到惩罚，引擎模块与护盾模块的所有船员都在拼命工作。
languages.original_text: The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.

traits.locale_text: 赫洛卡上尉被残忍处决，这让执法者与受执法者监管的船员变得更加勤勉。由于害怕受到惩罚，引擎模块与护盾模块的所有船员都在拼命工作。

languages.text: Komutan Hrotko'nun tüyler ürpertici infazı, hem infazcıların hem de denetlemekle yükümlü olduklarının çalışkanlıklarını artırdı. Motor ve kalkan modüllerindeki mürettebat, cezalandırılma korkusuyla artık son derece sıkı çalışıyor.
languages.original_text: The gruesome execution of Captain Hrotko has increased the diligence of both the enforcers and those they have been entrusted to supervise. The crews of the engines and shields modules now work their hardest for fear of punishment.
